summary: Iqbal, the deaf and mute son of a farmer, has a passion for the game of cricket and seeks the tutelage of a washed-up, alcoholic ex-player.

keywords: cricket the sport|character repeating someone else's dialogue|sign language|deaf mute|underdog
title: Iqbal
